Job Description: Job Description-  Guide team development efforts towards successful project delivery-  Provide technical leadership to teammates through coaching and mentorship. -  Maintain high standards of software quality within the team by establishing good practices and habits. -  Collaborate with other software developers,  business analysts and software architects to plan,  design,  develop,  test,  and maintain web-  and desktop- based business applications built on Microsoft technologies. -  Assist in the collection and documentation of user's requirements,  development of user stories,  estimates and work plans. -  Prepare reports,  manuals and other documentation on the status,  operation and maintenance of software. -  Strong conceptualization,  analytical,  logic and problem solving skill-  Work closely with a team as well as interfacing with various external Client and Business Groups. -  Knowledge of HTML 5,  CSS3,  Angular 2/ 4-  Strong JavaScript,  Ajax 4. 0,  JQuery skills,  Boot Strap-  Working experience with SQL Server or other advanced level databases (MS SQL 2012/ 2014,  SSIS,  SSAS,  SSRS)-  Strong T- SQL skills with experience developing complex queries and stored procedures in MS SQL Server,  Performance tuning. -  Working experience with Microsoft . Net MVC 4. 0/ 5. 0,  Entity Framework,  Linq is an added advantage-  Help analyze,  design,  code,  test,  debug and provide enhancements to existing software. -  Working knowledge of VISUAL STUDIO 2012/ 2013/ 2015,  with C#). -  Must possess strong understanding on OOPS concepts,  coding in C# and Web servicesPREFERRED SKILLS:-  Communication: Good verbal and written communication is a must. -  Teamwork Skills: Must be willing to manage a team & work with them. -  Strategy Building: Develop a strategy the team will use to reach its goal-  Operational: Manage the flow of day- to- day operations-  Reporting & Dashboards: Create reports to update the company on the team's progress & distribute reports to appropriate personnel-  Resource Management: Optimum.
